content: simple earwarmer quick and easy crochet pattern keep in mind there are countless patterns for earwarmers and headbands everywhere that come down to crocheting a long rectangle and sewing it shut i freehanded this one but it s so simple that there is a chance someone came up with something similar before i did so as well higher resolution canva document materials hook size = 5mm yarn needle yarn recommendation weight 4 alize burcum klasik/batik about 85m or 93yds you can also use thinner yarn with 5mm crochet hook to create a very lightweight headband ← two-colored by jumbo greece earth - 80m or 87yds each size of the finished headband lying flat 26cm x 10cm 10 2 x 4 abbreviations chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet blo - back loop only st/sts - stitch/stitches notes this pattern uses the american crochet terminology the base chain can be as long as desired chain 1 at the end of each row is the turning chain and does not count as a st 48 row should fit most adults comfortably pattern instructions base = chain 16 row 1 half_double_crochet across starting in the 2nd chain from the hook 15 sts chain 1 turn row 2-48 half_double_crochet in the 1st st blo half_double_crochet across until 1 st remains half_double_crochet in the last st 15 sts chain 1 turn leave a long tail for sewing sewing instructions fold the panel as shown in the pictures below and align the edges to sew all 4 layers together after sewing weave in the ends and turn the piece to the right side tadaa your simple earwarmers are complete any questions comments concerns feel free to contact me kami crochet
